chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
zero: pos n
i: nat
lr: list (pos n)
w: Vector.t nat n
v: Vector.t nat n

Goal:
v#>zero = 0 -> (forall p : pos n, In p lr -> p <> zero) -> (forall p : pos n, In p lr -> w#>p = 0) -> (forall p : pos n, ~ In p lr -> w#>p = v#>p) -> (i, mm_nullify i lr) // (i, v) ->> (length (mm_nullify i lr) + i, w)

Premises:
mm_nullify = fix mm_nullify (i : nat) (lr : list (pos n)) {struct lr} : list (mm_instr (pos n)) := match lr with | nil => nil | x :: lr0 => mm_null x zero i ++ mm_nullify (2 + i) lr0 end : nat -> list (pos n) -> list (mm_instr (pos n)) Arguments mm_nullify _%nat_scope _%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
vec_pos_ext : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v w : vec X n), (forall p : pos n, v#>p = w#>p) -> v = w
vec_list_inv : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (x : X), In x (vec_list v) -> exists p : pos n, x = v#>p
vec_list_In_iff : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (x : X), In x (vec_list v) < -> (exists p : pos n, x = v#>p)
mm_null_progress : forall src zero : pos n, src <> zero -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), v#>zero = 0 -> st = (2 + i, v[0/src]) -> (i, mm_null src zero i) // (i, v) -+> st
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat zero : pos n i : nat lr : list (pos n) v : vec nat n w : vec nat n |- nat]
map_vec_pos_equiv : forall (X : Type) (R : X -> X -> Prop) (Y : Type) (T : Y -> Y -> Prop), (forall y : Y, T y y) -> (forall x y z : Y, T x y -> T y z -> T x z) -> forall (n : nat) (f : vec X n -> Y), (forall (p : pos n) (v : vec X n) (x y : X), R x y -> T (f (v[x/p])) (f (v[y/p]))) -> forall v w : vec X n, (forall p : pos n, R (v#>p) (w#>p)) -> T (f v) (f w)
pos_nxt_inj : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), pos_nxt p = pos_nxt q -> p = q
sss_loop_complete : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (pre : data -> Prop) (spec : data -> data -> Prop) (f : data -> data), (forall x : data, x <> f x) -> forall C1 C2 : data -> Prop, (forall x : data, pre x -> {C1 x} + {C2 x}) -> forall i p : nat, out_code p P -> (forall x : data, pre x -> C1 x -> sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (i, f x) /\ pre (f x)) ->...-> p = q /\ (exists n : nat, C2 (iter f x n) /\ spec (iter f x n) y)
mm_nullify_length : forall (i : nat) (lr : list (pos n)), length (mm_nullify i lr) = 2 * length lr
vec_one_spec_neq : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), p <> q -> vec_one p#>q = 0
mm_steps_DEC_0_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (p, v) -[k'] -> st
mm_steps_DEC_1_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = S u -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -[k'] -> st
pos_O_inv = let pos_inv_t := fun n : nat => match n as x return (pos x -> Set) with | 0 => fun _ : pos 0 => False | S n0 => fun i : pos (S n0) => ((i = pos0) + {p : pos n0 | i = pos_nxt p})%type end in let pos_inv := fun (_tmp : nat) (p0 : pos _tmp) => match p0 as t in (pos n) return (pos_inv_t n t) with | @Fin.F1 n => inl eq_refl | @Fin.FS n p => inr (exist (fun p1 : pos n => pos_nxt p = pos_nxt p1) p eq_refl) end in pos_inv 0 : pos 0 -> False
Nat.le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m <= p -> n <= p
mm_special_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), Q se -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> mm_sss ρ (i, v) (j, w) -> P // (j, w) ->> se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, P // s -> > se -> Q s
vec_one_spec_eq : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), p = q -> vec_one p#>q = 1
vec_pos_set : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (g : pos n -> X) (p : pos n), vec_set_pos g#>p = g p
vec_one = fun (n : nat) (p : pos n) => vec_set_pos (fun q : pos n => if pos_eq_dec p q then 1 else 0) : forall n : nat, pos n -> vec nat n Arguments vec_one {n}%nat_scope
mma_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mma_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mm_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mm_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mm_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mm_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mma_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mma_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
vec_change_neq : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (p q : pos n) (x : X), p <> q -> v[x/p]#>q = v#>q
vec_change_eq : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (p q : pos n) (x : X), p = q -> v[x/p]#>q = x
pos_list_prop : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), In p (pos_list n)
mm_compute_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (k, v) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
vec_plus = fun (n : nat) (v w : vec nat n) => vec_set_pos (fun p : pos n => (v#>p) + (w#>p)) : forall n : nat, vec nat n -> vec nat n -> vec nat n Arguments vec_plus {n}%nat_scope
mm_term_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), (out_code (fst se) P -> Q se) -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> mm_sss ρ (i, v) (j, w) -> sss_output (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (j, w) se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, sss_output (mm_sss (n:=n)) P s se -> Q s
mm_compute_DEC_S : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
sss_loop_sound : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (pre : data -> Prop) (spec : data -> data -> Prop) (f : data -> data) (C1 C2 : data -> Prop), (forall x : data, pre x -> {C1 x} + {C2 x}) -> forall i p : nat, (forall x : data, pre x -> C1 x -> sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (i, f x) /\ pre (f x)) -> (forall x : data, pre x -> C2 x -> exists y : data, sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (p, y) /\ spec x y) -> forall x : data, pre x -> (exists n : nat, C2 (iter f x n)) -> exists (n : nat) (y : data), sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (p, y) /\ spec (iter f x n) y
mm_progress_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (k, v) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -+> st
mm_sss_DEC0_inv : forall (n : nat) (x : pos n) (k i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> mm_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (j, w) -> j = k /\ w = v
mm_sss_DEC1_inv : forall (n : nat) (x : pos n) (k u i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), v#>x = S u -> mm_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (j, w) -> j = 1 + i /\ w = v[u/x]
VectorDef.caseS' : forall (v0 : vec ?A (S ?n)) (P : vec ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : vec ?A ?n), P (h ## t)) -> P v0 where ?A : [n : nat zero : pos n i : nat lr : list (pos n) v : vec nat n w : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat zero : pos n i : nat lr : list (pos n) v : vec nat n w : vec nat n |- nat]
in_mma_sss_dec_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> mma_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)
mm_progress_DEC_S : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -+> st
VectorSpec.eq_nth_iff : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (v1 v2 : vec A n), (forall p1 p2 : pos n, p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth v1 p1 = VectorDef.nth v2 p2) < -> v1 = v2
mm_compute_INC : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, INCₐ x :: nil) <sc P -> P // (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> Type, P 0 vec_nil vec_nil -> (forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : vec ?A n0) (v2 : vec ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n0) (a ## v1) (b ## v2)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : vec ?A n0) (v2 : vec ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 where ?A : [n : nat zero : pos n i : nat lr : list (pos n) v : vec nat n w : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat zero : pos n i : nat lr : list (pos n) v : vec nat n w : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.rectS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall a : ?A, P 0 (a ## vec_nil)) -> (forall (a : ?A) (n0 : nat) (v0 : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v0 -> P (S n0) (a ## v0)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [n : nat zero : pos n i : nat lr : list (pos n) v : vec nat n w : vec nat n |- Type]

```  
intros.
intros H1 H2 H3 H4.
destruct H4 as [H4a H4b].
split.
- auto.
- rewrite mm_nullify_length. lia.
```

original: intros. intros H1 H2 H3 H4. destruct H4 as [H4a H4b]. split. - auto. - rewrite mm_nullify_length. lia.
